original_text: Jehoshaphat lived in the good way that his father Asa had lived. He only did things that the Lord says are right.
korean_text: 여호사밧이 그의 아버지 아사의 길로 행하여 돌이켜 떠나지 아니하고 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하였으나

sentences.original_text: Jehoshaphat lived in the good way
that his father Asa had lived
that the Lord says are right
